document_data.name: {{PAGENAME}}
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|6}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 4: Justice and the Law}}
document_data.mainbody: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' was a [[wizard]] in the employ of the [[Zhentarim]] that regularly visited [[Voonlar]], about every two or three [[tenday]]s. She was most often seen in the company of deputy [[Marsara Storntil]] and this led to secret speculations by the town gossips about Marsara's love life. The deputy was apparently defensive about Tamelia because one farm worker, who imagined himself a potential suitor and had found courage by consuming alcoholic beverages, asked her bluntly about the rumors. Marsara proceeded to beat him so severely that she and Tamelia were never bothered by such rumors again.
